content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 1, Chelsea 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 1, Chelsea 0.
Attempt missed. Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Daniel Drinkwater.
Substitution, Manchester City. Phil Foden replaces David Silva.
Attempt missed. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Daniel Drinkwater (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Álvaro Morata replaces Eden Hazard.
Foul by Daniel Drinkwater (Chelsea).
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Kyle Walker (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Emerson (Chelsea).
Offside, Chelsea. César Azpilicueta tries a through ball, but Eden Hazard is caught offside.
Substitution, Manchester City. Danilo replaces Oleksandr Zinchenko.
Substitution, Manchester City. Gabriel Jesus replaces Sergio Agüero.
Substitution, Chelsea. Emerson replaces Pedro.
Attempt missed. Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) header from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Bernardo Silva.
Substitution, Chelsea. Olivier Giroud replaces Willian.
Attempt missed. Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by David Silva.
Victor Moses (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Oleksandr Zinchenko (Manchester City).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Marcos Alonso.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Daniel Drinkwater.
Attempt blocked. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergio Agüero.
Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card.
Bernardo Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea).
Attempt saved. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Attempt missed. Victor Moses (Chelsea) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right misses to the right. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Eden Hazard (Chelsea) because of an injury.
Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City).
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Manchester City 1, Chelsea 0. Bernardo Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by David Silva with a cross.
Second Half begins Manchester City 0, Chelsea 0.
First Half ends, Manchester City 0, Chelsea 0.
